title: The Mystery of the Murdered Major
description: Army Major David Shannon is executed while asleep in bed. His wife Joan escapes unscathed but doesn’t see the shooter. The crime scene offers few leads until detectives make a bizarre discovery. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on August 12, 2011
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
